name: Fallout-CDDA Remastered(BN)
description: Brings a little bit of that retro-futuristic class to the Cataclysm. Guns, beasts, and more. Stuff from the Core Region, all the way to the Commonwealth. Pieced together with the mods Fallout-CDDA and it's rewrite by Tefnut and Fallout NE Mobs by Jolmar7. Updated by neutral001
